H3.text: Which nation in 2014 saw the abdication of Juan Carlos and the ascension of Felipe VI. SPAIN

A4.text: The Prince of Asturias, Felipe de Borb√≥n y Grecia, succeeded the throne under the name Felipe VI on the abdication of his father.

A5.text: The law was published in the Official State Gazette at midnight on Thursday, 19 June 2014, at which time its contents and the abdication of Juan Carlos from the Crown became effective.
